Content: Crimes have declined to a considerable extent during the period 2014 to 2017. A majority of these crimes had been sorted out afer investigations. These observations have been made by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. The Prime Minister was participating in the 152 Anniversary commemoration of the Sri Lanka Police. It was held at the Police Grounds in Colombo today. Among those who joined in the occasion were Minister Ranjith Maddumabandara and State Defence Minister Ruwan Wijewardena.
